leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 物理-粒子/多体/动力学生态

queries: [WEB] reduced order modeling python library github
[WEB] physics informed deep learning tools github

tools.name: Super-Resolution-Neural-Operator
tools.one_line_profile: Neural operator framework for super-resolution of physical fields
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Super-Resolution Neural Operator (SRNO) designed to enhance the resolution of physical field data, such as fluid dynamics simulations, using operator learning techniques.

tools.name: AI4SIM Model Collection
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of deep learning surrogate models for physical processes
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing canonical PyTorch Lightning pipelines and model implementations for surrogating various physical processes, developed by the AI4Sim team.

tools.name: BENO
tools.one_line_profile: Boundary-embedded neural operator for PDEs with complex geometries
tools.detailed_description: A boundary-embedded neural operator (BENO) implementation that incorporates complex boundary shapes and inhomogeneous boundary values for solving partial differential equations.

tools.name: LE-PDE-UQ
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification for deep learning-based PDE surrogates
tools.detailed_description: A framework that endows deep learning-based surrogate models with robust and efficient uncertainty quantification capabilities for both forward and inverse PDE problems.

tools.name: WDNO
tools.one_line_profile: Wavelet Diffusion Neural Operator for generative PDE simulation
tools.detailed_description: Wavelet Diffusion Neural Operator (WDNO) utilizes diffusion models in wavelet space for generative simulation and control of partial differential equations.

tools.name: flowTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Library for analysis and reduced-order modeling of fluid flows
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for the analysis and reduced-order modeling (ROM) of fluid flow data, leveraging PyTorch for optimization and learning.

tools.name: Seeq
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid physics-informed machine learning library
tools.detailed_description: A library for hybrid physics-informed machine learning, developed by the BYU-PRISM group, likely focusing on optimization and parameter estimation in scientific models.

tools.name: FactFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Transformer for PDE surrogate modelling
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the FactFormer architecture, a scalable Transformer-based model designed for efficient surrogate modeling of partial differential equations.

tools.name: ROMER
tools.one_line_profile: Reduced-Order Modeling of Fluid Flows with Transformers
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer-based framework for reduced-order modeling (ROM) of fluid dynamics, enabling efficient prediction and reconstruction of flow fields.

tools.name: DeepKoopman
tools.one_line_profile: Neural networks for learning Koopman eigenfunctions
tools.detailed_description: A library using neural networks to learn Koopman eigenfunctions, enabling the modeling of nonlinear dynamical systems as linear systems in a lifted space.

tools.name: LiiBRA.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Reduced-order state-space models for lithium-ion batteries
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for creating reduced-order state-space models of lithium-ion batteries using realisation algorithms, facilitating efficient battery simulation.

tools.name: EFDO
tools.one_line_profile: Neural operator for magnetotelluric data forward modeling
tools.detailed_description: A neural operator network designed for fast forward modeling of magnetotelluric data in complex media, serving as a surrogate for geophysical simulations.

tools.name: DeepOHeat
tools.one_line_profile: Operator learning-based thermal simulation for 3D-IC
tools.detailed_description: An operator learning-based tool for ultra-fast thermal simulation in 3D integrated circuit (3D-IC) design, providing a surrogate model for heat diffusion.

tools.name: keedmd
tools.one_line_profile: Koopman Eigenfunction Extended Dynamic Mode Decomposition
tools.detailed_description: A library for the construction of Koopman eigenfunctions and identification of lifted state-space models using the Koopman Eigenfunction Extended Dynamic Mode Decomposition (KEEDMD) method.

tools.name: CRNN
tools.one_line_profile: Julia library for modeling chemical reaction kinetics using neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package implementing Chemical Reaction Neural Networks (CRNN) for learning and modeling the dynamics of chemical kinetics and reaction systems.

tools.name: MARBLE
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven representation of non-linear dynamics over manifolds
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for learning representations of non-linear dynamics on manifolds based on statistical distributions of local phase portrait features, applicable to neural and physical systems.

tools.name: PIML4PDE
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed machine learning package for solving PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A Python package developed by EMSL-Computing for applying physics-informed machine learning techniques to solve partial differential equations.

tools.name: AutoKoopman
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Koopman operator methods for dynamical systems
tools.detailed_description: A library for automated data-driven analysis and control of dynamical systems using Koopman operator methods, including hyperparameter tuning and model selection.

tools.name: simulai
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for physics-informed machine learning pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit developed by IBM for building data-driven pipelines for physics-informed machine learning, supporting model reduction and operator learning.

tools.name: ITHACA-FV
tools.one_line_profile: Reduced order modelling library for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An OpenFOAM-based C++ library for reduced order modelling (ROM) in computational fluid dynamics, implementing methods like POD and Galerkin projection.

tools.name: AccelerateCFD_CE
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for creating reduced order models from CFD data
tools.detailed_description: Community Edition of the AccelerateCFD platform, designed to generate reduced order models (ROMs) from high-fidelity Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) simulations.

tools.name: JAX-DIPS
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable interfacial PDE solver using JAX
tools.detailed_description: A JAX-based differentiable solver for interfacial partial differential equations, enabling gradient-based optimization and learning in physics simulations.

tools.name: PinnDE
tools.one_line_profile: Library for solving DEs with PINNs and DeepONets
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for solving differential equations using Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) and Deep Operator Networks (DeepONets).

tools.name: NeurOLight
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Operator-based framework for integrated photonic device simulation
tools.detailed_description: A simulation framework utilizing Neural Operators to model and simulate integrated photonic devices, offering a data-driven alternative to traditional physics solvers.

tools.name: LabelFree-DNN-Surrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-constrained label-free deep learning for fluid flow surrogate modeling
tools.detailed_description: A surrogate modeling tool for fluid dynamics that employs physics-constrained deep learning techniques without requiring labeled data, enabling efficient flow predictions.

tools.name: Jittor
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance deep learning framework with JIT compiling
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework based on JIT compiling and meta-operators, widely used in AI for Science research for high-performance computing tasks.

tools.name: PINNs-based-MPC
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Neural Networks for Nonlinear Model Predictive Control
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) to approximate system dynamics for Nonlinear Model Predictive Control (NMPC), specifically for multi-body dynamics.

tools.name: Kriging-and-GE-Kriging-model-toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for Gradient-enhanced Kriging surrogate modeling
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for constructing Kriging and Gradient-Enhanced Kriging (GE-Kriging) surrogate models, useful for engineering design and optimization.

tools.name: KoopmanLab
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch library for Koopman Neural Operator learning
tools.detailed_description: A library for learning Koopman Operators using PyTorch, facilitating data-driven analysis and prediction of dynamical systems.

tools.name: MultiscaleTopOpt
tools.one_line_profile: 3D multiscale topology optimization using surrogate models
tools.detailed_description: A code for 3D multiscale topology optimization that leverages surrogate models to predict lattice microscale responses, developed by LLNL.

tools.name: libROM
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Reduced Order Models (ROM) with large scale parallelism
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for data-driven model reduction, emphasizing large-scale parallelism and linear subspace methods, suitable for physical simulations.

tools.name: pylibROM
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for libROM reduced order modeling library
tools.detailed_description: The Python bindings for libROM, enabling access to reduced order modeling capabilities within Python-based scientific workflows.

tools.name: ICON
tools.one_line_profile: In-Context Operator Networks for operator learning
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of In-Context Operator Networks (ICON), a method for learning operators in a context-aware manner for physical system simulation.

tools.name: DMD-Multiverse
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD) algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB package providing implementations of various Dynamic Mode Decomposition algorithms, accompanying a review article on the subject.

tools.name: ResDMD
tools.one_line_profile: Residual Dynamic Mode Decomposition for spectral properties of Koopman Operators
tools.detailed_description: Code for Residual Dynamic Mode Decomposition (ResDMD), a method for computing data-driven spectral properties of Koopman Operators with error control.

tools.name: KoopmanDL
tools.one_line_profile: Extended Dynamic Mode Decomposition with trainable dictionary
tools.detailed_description: A library for learning the Koopman operator using Extended Dynamic Mode Decomposition (EDMD) combined with a trainable dictionary (Deep Learning).

tools.name: sssMOR
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse State-Space and Model Order Reduction Toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for sparse state-space analysis and model order reduction (MOR) of large-scale dynamical systems.

tools.name: dsatools
tools.one_line_profile: Digital signal analysis library including DMD and SSA
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for digital signal analysis, processing, and parameter estimation, featuring methods like Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD) and Singular Spectrum Analysis (SSA).

tools.name: deepSI
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for Dynamical System Identification
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for dynamical system identification that incorporates deep learning methods to model complex system behaviors.

tools.name: kooplearn
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for learning the Koopman operator
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to learn the Koopman operator from data, enabling spectral analysis and prediction of dynamical systems.

tools.name: SMT
tools.one_line_profile: Surrogate Modeling Toolbox for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that contains a collection of surrogate modeling methods (response surface methods), sampling techniques, and benchmarking functions. It provides a unified interface for various surrogate models including Kriging, RBF, and neural networks.

tools.name: AutoOptimize.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic optimization and parallelization for SciML
tools.detailed_description: A library that provides automatic optimization and parallelization utilities for the Scientific Machine Learning (SciML) ecosystem in Julia, helping to accelerate simulation and training workflows.

tools.name: Catalyst.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical reaction network modeling interface for SciML
tools.detailed_description: A domain-specific language and library for defining and simulating chemical reaction networks. It integrates with the SciML ecosystem to provide high-performance solvers for mass action kinetics and systems biology models.

tools.name: DataDrivenDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Automated discovery of dynamical systems from data
tools.detailed_description: A library for data-driven modeling and automated discovery of differential equations (SINDy, etc.). It allows users to recover analytical governing equations from simulation or experimental data.

tools.name: DiffEqBase.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Base library for differential equation definitions in SciML
tools.detailed_description: The core library defining the abstract types and interfaces for differential equations in the Julia SciML ecosystem. It serves as the foundation for interoperability between solvers and modeling tools.

tools.name: DiffEqBayes.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian parameter estimation for differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A library that connects differential equation solvers with Bayesian inference tools (like Turing.jl and Stan) to perform probabilistic parameter estimation and uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: DiffEqCallbacks.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Event handling and callbacks for differential equation solvers
tools.detailed_description: Provides a library of callbacks for handling events, discontinuities, and other dynamic interventions during the numerical integration of differential equations.

tools.name: DiffEqFlux.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Neural differential equations and scientific machine learning layers
tools.detailed_description: A library for integrating neural networks with differential equations (Neural ODEs, SDEs, etc.). It provides differentiable solver layers for building physics-informed machine learning models.

tools.name: DiffEqGPU.jl
tools.one_line_profile: GPU acceleration for differential equation solvers
tools.detailed_description: Provides GPU-accelerated ensemble simulations and solver routines for the DifferentialEquations.jl ecosystem, enabling high-performance parallel solving of ODEs/SDEs.

tools.name: DiffEqOperators.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Finite difference operators for differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A library providing linear operators for the discretization of differential equations, facilitating the numerical solution of PDEs and other operator-based problems.

tools.name: DiffEqPhysics.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-specific differential equation formulations
tools.detailed_description: A library for constructing differential equations from physical principles (e.g., Hamiltonian, Lagrangian mechanics) for use in scientific machine learning and simulation.

tools.name: DiffEqProblemLibrary.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Library of benchmark problems for differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of standard differential equation problems (ODEs, SDEs, DAEs) used for testing, benchmarking, and examples within the SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: DifferentialEquations.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive differential equation solver suite
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance suite for solving differential equations (ODEs, SDEs, DAEs, DDEs) in Julia. It serves as the central entry point for the SciML simulation ecosystem.

tools.name: ExponentialUtilities.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Matrix exponential utilities for scientific computing
tools.detailed_description: Provides fast and differentiable implementations of matrix exponentials and related functions (like expmv) essential for exponential integrators and other scientific algorithms.

tools.name: FEniCS.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia wrapper for the FEniCS finite element library
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper allowing the use of the FEniCS Finite Element library within Julia, enabling PDE solving and integration with SciML tools.

tools.name: FluxNeuralOperators.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Operators (DeepONet, FNO) implementation in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing various neural operator architectures (DeepONet, Fourier Neural Operators) for learning mappings between infinite-dimensional function spaces, useful for PDE surrogates.

tools.name: HighDimPDE.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Solvers for high-dimensional PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A package for solving high-dimensional Partial Differential Equations using deep learning methods like Deep BSDE and Feynman-Kac, overcoming the curse of dimensionality.

tools.name: Integrals.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical integration interface for SciML
tools.detailed_description: A common interface for quadrature and numerical integration in Julia, supporting various backend libraries and high-dimensional integration.

tools.name: JumpProcesses.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation of jump processes and Gillespie algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A library for simulating jump processes, including Gillespie simulations for chemical kinetics and jump diffusions, integrated with the differential equation solvers.

tools.name: LabelledArrays.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Arrays with named elements for scientific modeling
tools.detailed_description: Provides array types where elements can be accessed by label (name) as well as index, simplifying the definition and manipulation of state vectors in scientific models.

tools.name: LinearSolve.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Unified interface for linear solvers
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance unified interface for linear solvers in Julia, allowing easy switching between factorization and Krylov methods for scientific computing applications.

tools.name: MethodOfLines.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Automated finite difference PDE discretization
tools.detailed_description: A library that automates the Method of Lines (MOL) discretization for Partial Differential Equations, converting them into ODE systems solvable by DifferentialEquations.jl.

tools.name: ModelOrderReduction.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Model order reduction for simulation acceleration
tools.detailed_description: A library providing techniques for model order reduction (ROM) to accelerate large-scale simulations by creating lower-dimensional approximations of complex systems.

tools.name: ModelingToolkit.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Acausal modeling and symbolic transformation framework
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive modeling framework for defining acausal, equation-based models. It provides symbolic capabilities for automated simplification, index reduction, and code generation for high-performance simulation.

tools.name: ModelingToolkitStandardLibrary.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Standard component library for ModelingToolkit
tools.detailed_description: A library of pre-built components (electrical, mechanical, thermal, etc.) for constructing multi-domain physical models using ModelingToolkit.jl.

tools.name: MultiScaleArrays.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Data structures for multi-scale simulations
tools.detailed_description: A framework for creating and managing multi-scale array structures, useful for simulations involving biological cells or other hierarchical physical systems.

tools.name: NBodySimulator.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable N-body simulation library
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable simulator for N-body problems, suitable for astrophysical and molecular dynamics simulations, allowing for gradient-based optimization and machine learning integration.

tools.name: NeuralOperators.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Operators library for SciML
tools.detailed_description: A library providing implementations of Neural Operators (like DeepONet and FNO) for learning mesh-independent solution operators to PDEs.

tools.name: NeuralPDE.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINN) solvers
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for solving Partial Differential Equations using Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs). It automates the construction of loss functions based on PDE constraints.

tools.name: NonlinearSolve.jl
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance nonlinear equation solvers
tools.detailed_description: A library providing robust and efficient solvers for systems of nonlinear equations, supporting Newton methods, bracketing methods, and integration with the SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: OperatorLearning.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Operator learning utilities for SciML
tools.detailed_description: A library focused on operator learning techniques within the SciML ecosystem, facilitating the training of models that map between infinite-dimensional function spaces.

tools.name: Optimization.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Unified interface for mathematical optimization
tools.detailed_description: A unified interface for various optimization packages in Julia, supporting local, global, gradient-based, and derivative-free optimization for scientific problems.

tools.name: OrdinaryDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance ODE solvers for Julia
tools.detailed_description: The primary library containing the implementations of ordinary differential equation (ODE) solvers in the SciML ecosystem, known for its performance and wide range of algorithms.

tools.name: ParameterizedFunctions.jl
tools.one_line_profile: DSL for defining parameterized differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A domain-specific language (DSL) that simplifies the definition of differential equations with parameters, making it easier to set up models for simulation and analysis.

tools.name: QuasiMonteCarlo.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Quasi-Monte Carlo sampling sequences
tools.detailed_description: A library for generating Quasi-Monte Carlo sequences (Sobol, Halton, etc.), which are useful for efficient sampling in high-dimensional integration and parameter space exploration.

tools.name: RecursiveArrayTools.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for recursive array structures
tools.detailed_description: Utilities for handling complex, nested array structures (like arrays of arrays) often encountered in scientific computing and differential equation solvers.

tools.name: ReservoirComputing.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Reservoir computing library for SciML
tools.detailed_description: A library providing implementations of Reservoir Computing (Echo State Networks, etc.) for time series prediction and learning dynamical systems.

tools.name: SciMLBase.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Base interface for the SciML ecosystem
tools.detailed_description: The foundational library defining the common interface and types for the entire Scientific Machine Learning (SciML) ecosystem, ensuring compatibility across different solvers and tools.

tools.name: SciMLOperators.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Matrix-free operators interface for scientific machine learning in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library providing a common interface for matrix-free operators, essential for memory-efficient scientific machine learning and differential equation solving.

tools.name: SciMLSensitivity.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Sensitivity analysis and gradient computation for scientific machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A component of the SciML ecosystem enabling sensitivity analysis (adjoint methods) for differential equations, crucial for training Neural ODEs and parameter estimation.

tools.name: StochasticDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Solvers for stochastic differential equations (SDEs)
tools.detailed_description: A library for solving stochastic differential equations, integrated with the SciML ecosystem for physics-informed machine learning and simulation.

tools.name: Sundials.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia interface to Sundials ODE/DAE solvers
tools.detailed_description: Provides an interface to the SUNDIALS suite (CVODE, IDA, KINSOL) for solving ODEs, DAEs, and nonlinear systems within the Julia SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: Surrogates.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Surrogate modeling and optimization library
tools.detailed_description: A library for building surrogate models (Kriging, Radial Basis Functions, etc.) and performing surrogate-based optimization, designed for scientific machine learning applications.

tools.name: TensorFlowDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) using TensorFlow in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A library bridging TensorFlow with the SciML ecosystem to implement Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) for solving differential equations.

tools.name: diffeqpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for DifferentialEquations.jl
tools.detailed_description: Allows Python users to utilize the high-performance differential equation solvers from the Julia SciML ecosystem via a Python wrapper.

tools.name: diffeqr
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for DifferentialEquations.jl
tools.detailed_description: Allows R users to utilize the high-performance differential equation solvers from the Julia SciML ecosystem via an R wrapper.

tools.name: NMFk.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Nonnegative Matrix Factorization with physics constraints
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for Nonnegative Matrix Factorization (NMF) combined with k-means clustering and physics constraints, used for unsupervised feature extraction in scientific data.

tools.name: NTFk.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Nonnegative Tensor Factorization with physics constraints
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for Nonnegative Tensor Factorization (NTF) combined with k-means clustering and physics constraints, extending NMFk to tensor data.

tools.name: ModelOrderReduction
tools.one_line_profile: SOFA plugin for Model Order Reduction
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the SOFA (Simulation Open Framework Architecture) framework to perform Model Order Reduction (MOR), enabling faster simulations of complex physical systems.

tools.name: rompc
tools.one_line_profile: Reduced Order Model Predictive Control
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for Model Predictive Control (MPC) using Reduced Order Models (ROM), facilitating control of high-dimensional dynamical systems.

tools.name: iLearn
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for feature analysis of DNA/RNA/Protein sequences
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit and web server for feature calculation, extraction, clustering, selection, and model construction for biological sequence analysis.

tools.name: koopcore
tools.one_line_profile: Koopman Kernels for Learning Dynamical Systems
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing Koopman operator theory with kernel methods for learning and predicting dynamical systems from trajectory data.

tools.name: EA_Battery_SPMparameterization
tools.one_line_profile: Reduced-order electrochemical battery model and parameterization
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool for parameterizing and simulating reduced-order electrochemical lithium-ion battery models (Single Particle Model), useful for fast charging control.

tools.name: Mimir
tools.one_line_profile: Memory-efficient MapReduce over MPI for HPC
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of MapReduce over MPI designed for high-performance computing environments, optimizing memory usage and performance for scientific data processing.

tools.name: rom-operator-inference-Python3
tools.one_line_profile: Operator Inference for non-intrusive model reduction
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for Operator Inference (OpInf), a data-driven method to learn reduced-order models from data, preserving physical structure.

tools.name: continuiti
tools.one_line_profile: Library for learning function operators with neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for learning function operators (such as DeepONet) to solve differential equations and model physical systems.

tools.name: sparse_dmd
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD) implementation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Sparse Dynamic Mode Decomposition, a data-driven method for identifying dynamical systems with sparsity constraints.

tools.name: LatticeQCD.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Lattice QCD simulations with dynamical fermions in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A native Julia library for performing Lattice Quantum Chromodynamics (Lattice QCD) simulations, supporting dynamical fermions in 4 dimensions.

tools.name: SymINDy
tools.one_line_profile: Symbolic Identification of Non-linear Dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A library for Symbolic Identification of Non-linear Dynamics that generalizes the SINDy algorithm by combining sparse regression with genetic programming.

tools.name: piDMD
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed Dynamic Mode Decomposition (piDMD) solver
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for physics-informed Dynamic Mode Decomposition (piDMD), allowing the incorporation of physical constraints into the DMD calculation for better dynamical system identification.

tools.name: BifurcationInference.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for learning state-space targets in dynamical systems
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for inferring state-space targets and parameters in dynamical systems, designed to work within the BifurcationKit ecosystem for bifurcation analysis.

tools.name: pifno
tools.one_line_profile: Physics Informed Fourier Neural Operator implementation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Physics Informed Fourier Neural Operators (PI-FNO) for solving partial differential equations using physics-informed deep learning.

tools.name: dmd-neuro
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic Mode Decomposition for large-scale neural recordings
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB library for computing Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD) specifically adapted for analyzing large-scale neural recording data in neuroscience research.

tools.name: ConvolutionalNeuralOperator
tools.one_line_profile: Convolutional Neural Operators for robust PDE learning
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of Convolutional Neural Operators (CNO), a deep learning framework for accurate and robust learning of partial differential equations.

tools.name: GAOT
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry Aware Operator Transformer for PDEs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Geometry Aware Operator Transformer (GAOT), an efficient neural surrogate model for solving PDEs on arbitrary domains.

tools.name: rigno
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based operator learning in arbitrary geometries
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for graph-based operator learning, enabling the solution of PDEs on arbitrary geometries using graph neural networks.

tools.name: cnn-surrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian deep convolutional networks for surrogate modeling
tools.detailed_description: A library for creating Bayesian deep convolutional encoder-decoder networks, designed for surrogate modeling and uncertainty quantification in scientific applications.

tools.name: pde-surrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-constrained deep learning for PDE surrogate modeling
tools.detailed_description: A framework for high-dimensional surrogate modeling and uncertainty quantification using physics-constrained deep learning, specifically for PDE systems without labeled data.

tools.name: GPdoemd
tools.one_line_profile: Design of experiments for model discrimination using GP surrogates
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for optimal experimental design aimed at model discrimination, utilizing Gaussian process surrogate models to accelerate the process.

tools.name: PYRO-NN
tools.one_line_profile: Python Reconstruction Operators in Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A high-level Python API for reconstruction operators (like Radon transform) integrated into neural networks, facilitating deep learning-based medical image reconstruction.

tools.name: perform
tools.one_line_profile: 1D unsteady compressible reacting flow simulation framework
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for simulating one-dimensional unsteady compressible reacting flows, designed specifically for prototyping and testing reduced-order model (ROM) methods.

tools.name: dmdtools
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Dynamic Mode Decomposition variants
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing tools for computing various forms of Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD), a data-driven method for analyzing dynamical systems.

tools.name: datafold
tools.one_line_profile: EDMD and Diffusion Maps for system identification
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for data-driven system identification using Extended Dynamic Mode Decomposition (EDMD) and geometric data analysis using Diffusion Maps.

tools.name: pykoop
tools.one_line_profile: Koopman operator identification library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for identifying Koopman operators from data, compatible with scikit-learn, supporting various lifting functions and regression methods for system identification.

tools.name: deeptime
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for analysis of time series data using dimensionality reduction and Markov models
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for the analysis of time series data, focusing on dimensionality reduction, clustering, and Markov model estimation. It is widely used in molecular dynamics and dynamical systems to extract kinetic models and metastable states from trajectory data.

tools.name: SINDy-PI
tools.one_line_profile: Robust algorithm for parallel implicit sparse identification of nonlinear dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A robust algorithm implementation for Parallel Implicit Sparse Identification of Nonlinear Dynamics (SINDy-PI). It enables the identification of implicit dynamics and rational nonlinearities from data, suitable for complex physical systems.

tools.name: hydrogym
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement learning environment for fluid dynamics control
tools.detailed_description: An open-source library of challenge problems in data-driven modeling and control of fluid dynamics, wrapped in a standard Reinforcement Learning (RL) interface. It facilitates the development and benchmarking of control algorithms for fluid flows.

tools.name: pykoopman
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for computing data-driven approximations to the Koopman operator
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for computing data-driven approximations to the Koopman operator. It provides tools for learning linear embeddings of nonlinear dynamical systems, enabling linear control and analysis techniques on complex systems.

tools.name: PySINDy
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse Identification of Nonlinear Dynamics (SINDy) in Python
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python package for the sparse identification of nonlinear dynamical systems from data. It allows researchers to discover governing equations from noisy measurement data using sparse regression techniques.

tools.name: pynirom
tools.one_line_profile: Python tools for non-intrusive reduced order modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing tools for Non-Intrusive Reduced Order Modeling (NIROM). It supports the creation of surrogate models from data without requiring access to the governing equations' source code.

tools.name: DMDpack
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD)
tools.detailed_description: A Python package implementing various Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD) algorithms. It is used for decomposing complex dynamical systems into spatiotemporal modes, facilitating analysis and reduced-order modeling.

tools.name: data-driven-dynamics
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven dynamics modeling framework for aerial vehicles
tools.detailed_description: A framework for data-driven modeling of dynamics, specifically tailored for aerial vehicles. It provides tools for learning dynamic models from flight data, useful for control and simulation.

tools.name: GCA-ROM
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Convolutional Autoencoder for Nonlinear Model Order Reduction
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Graph Convolutional Autoencoder (GCA) architectures for nonlinear model order reduction (ROM). It leverages graph neural networks to learn reduced representations of physical systems on unstructured meshes.

tools.name: U-FNO
tools.one_line_profile: Enhanced Fourier neural operator model for multiphase flow simulation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model based on Fourier Neural Operators (FNO) designed for multiphase flow problems, specifically addressing gas saturation and pressure buildup in geological carbon storage.

tools.name: MemoryEfficientStableLDS
tools.one_line_profile: Memory-efficient learning of stable linear dynamical systems
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB codebase for learning stable Linear Dynamical Systems (LDS) from data with memory efficiency, suitable for prediction and control tasks in dynamical systems.

tools.name: fusion_surrogates
tools.one_line_profile: Surrogate transport models for tokamak fusion simulation
tools.detailed_description: A library providing surrogate models for transport simulations in tokamak fusion reactors, enabling faster evaluation of plasma properties compared to high-fidelity physics simulators.

tools.name: SSMLearn
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven reduced order modeling for nonlinear dynamical systems
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for learning Spectral Submanifolds (SSM) from data to construct reduced-order models of nonlinear dynamical systems.

tools.name: SSMLearnPy
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of SSMLearn for reduced order modeling
tools.detailed_description: The Python version of the SSMLearn toolbox, facilitating data-driven reduced order modeling for nonlinear dynamical systems via Spectral Submanifolds.

tools.name: matlab-DMD
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB implementation of Dynamic Mode Decomposition
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight MATLAB library for performing Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD) to analyze fluid dynamics and other time-series data.

tools.name: matlab-koopman
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB implementation of Koopman operator algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB library for estimating Koopman operators to analyze nonlinear dynamical systems using linear techniques.

tools.name: odmd
tools.one_line_profile: Online and Window Dynamic Mode Decomposition
tools.detailed_description: Python and MATLAB implementations of Online DMD and Window DMD algorithms for real-time or streaming analysis of dynamical systems.

tools.name: hippyflow
tools.one_line_profile: Dimension reduced surrogate construction for parametric PDE maps
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for constructing dimension-reduced surrogate models for parametric Partial Differential Equations (PDEs), facilitating efficient inverse problems and uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: ROM_code
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical tool for reduced-order modeling of fluid flows
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based numerical tool designed for constructing reduced-order models (ROM) specifically for fluid flow simulations.

tools.name: pysindy-gui
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical User Interface for PySINDy
tools.detailed_description: A GUI wrapper for the PySINDy library, enabling users to perform sparse identification of nonlinear dynamics (SINDy) without writing code.

tools.name: mpc-koopman
tools.one_line_profile: Model-based Control using Koopman Operators
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for implementing Model Predictive Control (MPC) using Koopman operator theory to linearize nonlinear dynamics for control purposes.

tools.name: RAVEN
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic risk analysis and uncertainty quantification framework
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework for probabilistic risk analysis, uncertainty quantification, parameter optimization, and model reduction, often used in nuclear engineering and complex system analysis.

tools.name: PFNR
tools.one_line_profile: Implementations of Fourier Subneural Operator and related models
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing implementations for Winning SubNetwork (WSN), Fourier Subneural Operator (FSO), and other neural implicit representations for scientific machine learning tasks.

tools.name: brglm2
tools.one_line_profile: Bias reduction in generalized linear models
tools.detailed_description: An R package for estimation and inference from generalized linear models using explicit and implicit methods for bias reduction, useful for statistical analysis in scientific research.

tools.name: pinns_for_comp_mech
tools.one_line_profile: PINNs for Computational Mechanics based on DeepXDE
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) specifically tailored for computational mechanics problems, built on top of the DeepXDE framework.

tools.name: VENI-VINDy-VICI
tools.one_line_profile: Interpretable data-driven framework for generative reduced order models
tools.detailed_description: A framework for building generative reduced order models (ROMs) with embedded uncertainty quantification, focusing on interpretability and data-driven discovery.

tools.name: position_induced_transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Position-induced Transformer for operator learning in PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the Position-induced Transformer, a model designed for operator learning tasks to solve partial differential equations.

tools.name: DeepXDE
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive library for scientific machine learning and physics-informed neural networks
tools.detailed_description: DeepXDE is a powerful library for scientific machine learning (SciML), specifically designed for solving partial differential equations (PDEs) using physics-informed neural networks (PINNs), DeepONet, and other operator learning methods. It supports multiple backends (TensorFlow, PyTorch, JAX, PaddlePaddle) and provides a unified interface for solving forward and inverse problems in physics and engineering.

tools.name: EZyRB
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for Model Order Reduction (MOR) of parametric physical systems
tools.detailed_description: EZyRB (Easy Reduced Basis method) is a Python library for performing Model Order Reduction (MOR) on parametric physical systems. It implements methods such as Proper Orthogonal Decomposition (POD) and AutoEncoders to construct reduced order models from high-fidelity data.

tools.name: PINA
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs)
tools.detailed_description: PINA (Physics-Informed Neural networks for Advanced modeling) is a Python package that provides an intuitive interface for solving Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) and approximating functions using Physics-Informed Neural Networks. It supports various problem definitions and training strategies.

tools.name: AI4FluidSimulations
tools.one_line_profile: Library for training large-scale surrogate models for fluid dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A C++ codebase/library designed to train large-scale surrogate models for fluid simulation tasks, specifically targeting CO2 flow in porous media and solving 3D Navier-Stokes equations. It serves as a high-performance tool for AI-accelerated fluid dynamics.

tools.name: morgen
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for Model Order Reduction in gas and energy networks
tools.detailed_description: morgen (Model Order Reduction for Gas and Energy Networks) is a MATLAB toolbox developed by MPI Magdeburg. It provides tools for reducing the complexity of gas and energy network models while preserving their essential dynamics.

tools.name: SROMPy
tools.one_line_profile: Python module for generating Stochastic Reduced Order Models (SROMs)
tools.detailed_description: SROMPy is a Python module developed by NASA for generating Stochastic Reduced Order Models (SROMs). It is used to efficiently represent uncertain input parameters in computational models, facilitating uncertainty quantification and propagation.

tools.name: UQPCE
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty Quantification using Polynomial Chaos Expansion surrogate modeling
tools.detailed_description: UQPCE is a Python-based research code from NASA for Uncertainty Quantification (UQ) using Polynomial Chaos Expansion (PCE). It utilizes non-intrusive PCE surrogate modeling techniques to efficiently estimate uncertainties in parametric computational studies.

tools.name: NeuralOperator
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive library for learning in infinite dimensions with neural operators
tools.detailed_description: A core library for implementing Neural Operators (like FNO) in PyTorch, enabling resolution-invariant solution of PDEs and operator learning tasks.

tools.name: SMPT
tools.one_line_profile: SMT-based model checker for Petri nets
tools.detailed_description: A Satisfiability Modulo Theories (SMT) based model checker designed for reachability analysis in Petri nets, which are used for modeling distributed systems and biological networks.

tools.name: operalib
tools.one_line_profile: Library for learning with operator-valued kernels
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing operator-valued kernels for machine learning tasks, useful for vector-valued regression and functional data analysis.

tools.name: OMD
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB package for Optimal Mode Decomposition and DMD
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB package for computing Optimal Mode Decomposition (OMD) and Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD), developed by the Oxford Control Group for analyzing dynamical systems.

tools.name: nmor
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for model reduction of dynamical systems
tools.detailed_description: A framework leveraging deep learning techniques for non-linear model order reduction (MOR) of dynamical systems, facilitating faster simulations.

tools.name: NodeLab
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB repository for meshfree methods and PINNs
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for node generation and adaptive refinement to support meshfree methods, Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs), and DeepONet for solving PDEs.

tools.name: PDEBench
tools.one_line_profile: Extensive benchmark suite for Scientific Machine Learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark dataset and code suite for evaluating machine learning methods on various Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) across different domains.

tools.name: NeuralFoil
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed machine learning tool for airfoil aerodynamics
tools.detailed_description: A practical tool for airfoil aerodynamic analysis that utilizes physics-informed machine learning to provide rapid predictions, exposed as a Python library.

tools.name: pi-optimal
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Reinforcement Learning in dynamic systems control
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python library designed to model, optimize, and control dynamic systems using Reinforcement Learning (RL) techniques.

tools.name: SLIM
tools.one_line_profile: Stable linear layers for physics-informed machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A library providing drop-in replacements for PyTorch nn.Linear layers, designed to improve stability and incorporate inductive priors in physics-informed machine learning applications.

tools.name: SKDMD
tools.one_line_profile: Sparsity-promoting Kernel Dynamic Mode Decomposition
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Sparsity-promoting Kernel Dynamic Mode Decomposition (SKDMD) for analyzing nonlinear dynamical systems and extracting coherent structures.

tools.name: pyMOR
tools.one_line_profile: Model Order Reduction with Python
tools.detailed_description: A software library for building model order reduction applications, particularly for parametrized partial differential equations (PDEs). It supports various reduction methods and integrates with external PDE solvers.

tools.name: ConvDO
tools.one_line_profile: Convolutional Differential Operators for Physics-based Deep Learning
tools.detailed_description: A library providing convolutional differential operators to facilitate physics-based deep learning studies, enabling the integration of differential constraints into neural networks.

tools.name: gd-qpt
tools.one_line_profile: Gradient-descent quantum process tomography
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing quantum process tomography by learning Kraus operators using gradient descent, useful for characterizing quantum channels and gates.

tools.name: redbKIT
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB library for reduced-order modeling of parametrized PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB library designed for model order reduction of parametrized partial differential equations, providing tools for simulation and reduced basis generation.

tools.name: profit
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic Response Model Fitting with Interactive Tools
tools.detailed_description: A framework for surrogate modeling and uncertainty quantification, providing tools for fitting probabilistic response models to simulation data.

tools.name: torch-cfd
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Operator-Assisted Computational Fluid Dynamics in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch library for accelerating computational fluid dynamics (CFD) simulations using neural operators, facilitating the integration of deep learning with traditional CFD solvers.

tools.name: FNO4CO2
tools.one_line_profile: Learned coupled inversion framework for carbon sequestration monitoring using Fourier Neural Operators
tools.detailed_description: A scientific machine learning tool that utilizes Fourier Neural Operators (FNO) for coupled inversion tasks, specifically designed for monitoring and forecasting carbon sequestration processes in geophysics.

tools.name: dfno
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed implementation of Fourier Neural Operators for large-scale scientific machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A Python library enabling distributed training and inference of Fourier Neural Operators (FNO), designed to scale operator learning models for high-dimensional physics simulations.

tools.name: LAMP
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based surrogate model with joint evolution learning and mesh optimization
tools.detailed_description: A surrogate modeling tool that jointly learns the evolution model of a physical system and optimizes computational costs via remeshing, presented at ICLR 2023.

tools.name: KoopmanMPC_Quadrotor
tools.one_line_profile: Koopman operator-based Model Predictive Control for quadrotor dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolkit implementing data-driven control using Koopman operator theory, specifically applied to the dynamics and control of quadrotors.

tools.name: DL-ROM-Meth
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based reduced order models for nonlinear time-dependent PDEs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of deep learning-based reduced order models (DL-ROM) designed to solve nonlinear time-dependent parametrized Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) efficiently.

tools.name: POD-DL-ROM
tools.one_line_profile: Enhanced reduced order models using POD and deep learning for parametrized PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A tool combining Proper Orthogonal Decomposition (POD) with deep learning to create enhanced reduced order models for nonlinear parametrized PDEs, improving efficiency over standard DL-ROMs.

tools.name: PhaseNO
tools.one_line_profile: Phase Neural Operator for modeling dynamics
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Phase Neural Operator, a specialized operator learning architecture designed to capture phase-dependent dynamics in physical systems.

tools.name: gwsurrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Interface to gravitational wave surrogate models
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing an easy-to-use interface for evaluating surrogate models of gravitational waveforms, used in astrophysics for efficient signal generation and analysis.

tools.name: TensorDiffEq
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Physics-Informed Deep Learning framework on TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for efficient and scalable Physics-Informed Deep Learning (PINNs) and Scientific Machine Learning, built on TensorFlow with support for multi-worker distributed computing.

tools.name: neurop_invdes
tools.one_line_profile: Neural operator surrogates for electromagnetic inverse design
tools.detailed_description: A tool utilizing neural operators as surrogate models to accelerate inverse design processes in electromagnetics and photonics.

tools.name: NUNO
tools.one_line_profile: Non-Uniform Neural Operator for solving PDEs on irregular grids
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Non-Uniform Neural Operator (NUNO), designed to handle operator learning tasks on non-uniform meshes and grids efficiently.

tools.name: Diffusion-based-Flow-Prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty-aware surrogate models for airfoil flow simulations using diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models (DDPM) as uncertainty-aware surrogates for predicting fluid flow around airfoils, enabling probabilistic simulation.

tools.name: snapshot_pod_rom_py
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of Snapshot POD for reduced order modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to calculate Proper Orthogonal Decomposition (POD) modes from snapshot data and generate reduced order models (ROM) for system dynamics.

tools.name: Kinetic.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Universal modeling and simulation of fluid mechanics using machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for modeling and simulation of fluid mechanics based on the Boltzmann equation, integrating machine learning for multiscale and multiphysics flows.

tools.name: GAN-ROM
tools.one_line_profile: GAN-based reduced-order model framework for time series prediction and data assimilation
tools.detailed_description: A framework utilizing Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN) within a Reduced-Order Model (ROM) context to handle time series prediction, data assimilation, and uncertainty quantification for dynamical systems.

tools.name: H_Kriging
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB implementation of Hierarchical Kriging surrogate models
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB library for constructing Hierarchical Kriging models, a type of variable fidelity surrogate model that improves upon co-Kriging for multi-fidelity data fusion.

tools.name: EasySurrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for creating surrogate models of multiscale systems
tools.detailed_description: Part of the VECMA toolkit, this tool facilitates the creation and deployment of surrogate models specifically designed for multiscale simulations and uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: Denovo-Pinal
tools.one_line_profile: Text-guided de novo protein design model
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for generating protein structures based on textual descriptions, enabling text-guided de novo protein design.

tools.name: Koopman-Neural-Network-Training
tools.one_line_profile: Software for training neural networks via Koopman operator theory
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB software package for optimizing and training neural networks by leveraging Koopman operator theory to linearize nonlinear dynamics in the latent space.

tools.name: turbulence-modeling-PIML
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed machine learning framework for Reynolds stress turbulence modeling
tools.detailed_description: A data-driven framework for Reynolds stress modeling in turbulence simulations using physics-informed machine learning (PIML) techniques to improve RANS predictions.

tools.name: cDMDc
tools.one_line_profile: Compressive Dynamic Mode Decomposition with Control (cDMDc) implementation
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of Compressive Dynamic Mode Decomposition with Control (cDMDc) for system identification and dynamics modeling from compressive measurements.
